metadata.name: Restore Public AWS RDS Instance
metadata.comment: Detects the recovery of a new public database instance from a snapshot. It may be a part of data exfiltration.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM datastore_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('rds.amazonaws.com') AND lower(databucket.is_public) = lower('true') AND lower(api.operation) = lower('restoredbinstancefromdbsnapshot'))

output.summary: Detects the recovery of a new public database instance from a snapshot. It may be a part of data exfiltration.
